definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must

sentences.english: Women in the MENA have the right to inheritance.
sentences.chinese: 中東與北非地區的婦女具有遺產繼承權。

sentences.english: Dahomey Amazons : this unit is available when holding territory in North Africa.
sentences.chinese: 必須擁有疆土在北非，這個單位是可利用的。

sentences.english: Dahomey Amazons: this unit is available when holding territory in North Africa.
sentences.chinese: 必須擁有疆土在北非，這個單位是可招募的。

sentences.english: Migration within and out of MENA has a long history.
sentences.chinese: 中東和北非地區之間和之外的移民具有長久的歷史。

sentences.english: We are not embarked on a grand mission for democracy in North Africa.
sentences.chinese: 爲了北非的的民主，我們正在從事着偉大的使命。

sentences.english: Papermaking began in China and from here it spread to North Africa and Europe.
sentences.chinese: 造紙術開始於中國，隨後傳入北非和歐洲。

sentences.english: In the Middle East and North Africa, nothing analogous occurred.
sentences.chinese: 但在中東和北非，並沒有發生類似的變化。

sentences.english: People from north african countries have an arabic rather than a negroid appearance.
sentences.chinese: 北非人具有阿拉伯人的外表，跟黑人不一樣。

sentences.english: I remember in particular two young American girls I once met in North Africa.
sentences.chinese: 我特別記得我曾在北非遇見的兩個年輕美國女郎。

sentences.english: For the present, young societies dominate the Middle East and North Africa (MENA).
sentences.chinese: 當前，中東和北非地區的年輕羣體居多。

sentences.english: Hailing from North Africa, many Berbers are now settled in the lands of Moorish Spain.
sentences.chinese: 大量來自北非的柏柏爾人現在定居於摩爾西班牙地區。

sentences.english: Why, he asks, is there no haute cuisine based on north African spices?
sentences.chinese: 他問道，北非調味品爲什麼做不出高級料理？

sentences.english: Oil should remain excessively volatile as the situation unwinds in North Africa.
sentences.chinese: 從北非情況來看，原油勢必繼續極端震盪。

sentences.english: The Sahara desert is a natural barrier that separates Northern and Central Africa.
sentences.chinese: 撒哈拉沙漠是分隔北非和中非的天然屏障。

sentences.english: Free zones have many merits and have boosted investment in many MENA countries.
sentences.chinese: 自由區有許多好處並且帶動了中東北非的投資。

sentences.english: Recent research suggests this may not be so.
sentences.chinese: 最近的調查表明清苦可能北非如此。

definition: Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
